vote.title: Authorize a contract with the Dallas Arts District Foundation for the donation of privately funded design plans for a City of Dallas 2017 General Obligation Bond Program Project for streetscape and pedestrian improvements at the intersection of Pearl Street and Flora Street - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information for potential future costs)
